programme.title: Street Cats
programme.desc: Cat is king at GrandPA’s house but out on the street it’s a different story. The “Mean Cats” are a local gang of street cats that always pull a fast one on Cat.

programme.title: Robo-Gummy
programme.desc: Finding himself over-committed to too many things, Gummy orders a few duplicate robots of himself... who winds up in the end causing more trouble than they’re worth!

programme.title: Sleepy Colonel
programme.desc: It is a sleep deprived Colonel and a caring bro Don who would do anything to make his big bro sleep. And there is Larry, Marly and Charly who scream the life out of Colonel. It is a war for a little calm slumber. And the brothers realize that, with the rats around, it is an impossible thing to get.

programme.title: The Secret of the Fort
programme.desc: An old fort in the water is a great place for a small outing in history and Dunky is all curious to do just that. So Keet and Cat also tag along in the fort.

programme.title: Baby On Loose
programme.desc: One fine day, Don finds a baby at his doorstep. But with the rats around, it is indeed a mission for don and colonel to keep the baby safe. Will the dogs keep the baby safe? What twist could possibly happen?

programme.title: POT BOILER
programme.desc: Chai Rajas normal kettle is sent in for repair and Chai Raja, very hesitantly brings out the antique kettle that is his inheritance from his great granddad. With extreme care and caution (and reverence), he sets about making tea, but then there is a sudden visit by the politician who demands that Chai Raja sit with him to discuss about tea provision for the upcoming elections. Chai Raja cant refuse and Sundar has to take on the task of tea making while Chai Raja sits with the politician. Sundar, knowing Chai Rajas affections for the special kettle handles it with kid gloves but he doesnt anticipate Basha poking his tail in and thats when mayhem ensues. As Chai Raja glares intermittently from afar, Sundar desperately tries to keep the pot boiling without melting it up altogether. He is however distracted by the customers who dont much seem to like the taste of tea being served that day. Basha takes advantage of Sundars distraction and flicks the kettle. Sundar desperately tries to get it back. He lunges and manages to yank Basha by his tail, but this only sends the ancient kettle flying. Later we see Chai Raja tearfully hang up a new wind-chime (made of pieces of his antique kettle) and then glare at Sundar who has been assigned a tower of dishes to wash. Basha sniggers in the distance, blowing into the spout of the kettle, whistling the chai chaitune!

programme.title: Bird House
programme.desc: Dunky has just finished making a nice bird house for the new pigeon family and their new babies. The new family is grateful and Keet is their chosen godmother.

programme.title: DEEP FRIED PRIDE
programme.desc: After discovering a powerful ancient mask that transforms him in to a (finally) formidable opponent, Mark turns on Durian and decides to pull rank

programme.title: Golden Eggs
programme.desc: Hoodie has his eyes on the hens eggs in GrandPAs farm. Keet has saved them once but is sure Hoodie will try again.

programme.title: I Gotta Go !
programme.desc: Rise and Shine Don- it’s a normal morning at the Doggy household…but wait.. whats the mice upto in the bathroom…Looks like there is no way Don can start his day normally ever!

programme.title: Monkey Business
programme.desc: Don’s food supplies are getting stolen and he blames the rats. Now it seems there is a new thief around. And it is a monkey from the courtyard tree. And the monkey is definitely smarter and messier than the dogs and the rats put together. But, at last when they are about to catch the monkey, the storey takes an unexpected turn…….

programme.title: The Boy Who Cried Wolf
programme.desc: The shepherd boy is bored of uneventfully peaceful days. One day, he gets an idea for a prank - to lie about seeing a wolf to his village people.

programme.title: AMAZING FLYING MONKEY SHARKS
programme.desc: Victor and CeCe purchase a Grow Your Own Pets, kit at a local flea market. As the Creepy Candy are sweltering because of the broken air conditioner temptation gets the best of them. Disappointment turns into mayhem when the Creepy Candy dive into the mix! Will the pets come to life? Will the library be trashed? Tune in to the next episode to find out!

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Hula Hoop
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Tarot Tales
programme.desc: A fake yogi loses his forecasting parrot and is in search for a replacement. As he passes by GrandPA’s house he sees Keet and wants him as his fortune telling parrot.

programme.title: A Smighty Fairy Tale
programme.desc: Leila and Zip go on an adventure to find the magical fairies of the forest. Sneevil has used magic to pretend to be a fairy and is looking to destroy them and steal the Earth Stone. With the help of the real forest fairies, the Super Six take back the Stone and save the day.

programme.title: Love in the World
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Double Role
programme.desc: ‘Ting tong’ .. Cat opens the door to sees a milk bowl at the door step. He slurps it up and ‘ZAP’ a Cat clone is formed.

programme.title: APPRENTICE ALERT
programme.desc: Chai Raja is in his inventive mood and rigging up a new treat for his customers. In streak Basha chased by Sundar and the two mess around the kitchen while Chai Raja has stepped out for a second. As he tosses stuff to keep Sundar at bay, Basha accidentally makes a couple of special jalebis. Chai Raja steps back in and the two freeze mid-motion. Chai Raja scoops out the simmering jalebis and sniffs, his nose wrinkling. Sundar eagerly points at Basha sure that the monkey is sure to get in trouble this time, but much to his chagrin, Basha is hired- as an apprentice!! As Sundar glumly waits at the tables, Basha (the show-off) not only builds an acrobatic rapport with Chai Raja and makes life miserable for Sundar, but also manages to gobble up fries on the sly. Sundar has to find some means of getting Basha fired and tries to sneak in and mess with Bashas batter. But he ends up only making it better and earning Basha more pats on his back. The MP arrives and Chai Raja wants to show off his new apprentices skills Basha is in the spotlight and sure to crack under the heat. Sundar, meanwhile ready to be rid of Basha in any manner possible, sticks dynamite in the batter. Basha, stumped as to what to cook , hastily shapes up the batter into an inviting cake. Seeing a wick, the MP lights it- and slices...KABOOM! Both Basha and Sundar, trod with heavy shoulders out the tea stall as a charred Chai Raja signals they are fired.

programme.title: What CeCe Saw
programme.desc: Upon discovering the Creepy Candy TM fooling around in his secret laboratory again, Victor crams them into his lunchbox. Soon after, he bumps into CeCe OMalley, the new girl at school, and their lunchboxes accidently get switched. Once Victor realizes this He chases after CeCe to keep her from opening the lunchbox.Can Victor get to her in time before she opens the lunchbox? Can he stop her from discovering his secret about the Creepy Candy TM? Will Cece learn about the other creepy secrets the old library holds?

programme.title: Tota Raja
programme.desc: Chai Raja adopts a parrot (without a cage) who suddenly considers himself master of the cafe. Sundar now has to take orders from the parrot, who assumes the role of Chai Rajas second-in-command. Sundar detests the parrot but has to take good care of him to make Chai Raja happy. Basha decides to take advantage. He drops water on the parrot and the blame falls on Sundar. The parrot makes Sundars life miserable and Basha too gets caught in the parrots wrath. Sundar and Basha team up and find a way to make Chai Raja fire the parrot.

programme.title: The Tin Soldier
programme.desc: The brass soldier, GoGo who entered the playroom where the toys lived has no leg. A soldier who feels homogeneity with a ballerina who always stands with one leg up. But the soldier is caught up in a clown trap and falls out of the window.

programme.title: Remote War
programme.desc: Don and the terrific trio are at war for the TV remote. It all comes down to a swallowed remote that changes channels with every hiccup. Now that is very convenient. The mice get ready in Scuba Gear to perform a close tummy surgery to save the remote. Will sentimental soap or Jolly Good cricket win the Toss?

programme.title: Gold Ax and Silver Ax
programme.desc: Hardworking woodsman GoGo loses his only Ax in the pond. GoGos cry for help summons the Mountain Spirit, who rewards for his honesty. Another greedy woodsman UGo hears the story, and heads to the pond himself.

programme.title: The Red Shoes
programme.desc: Poor Girl GoGo loses her mother one day. GoGo is adopted by her rich grandmother WI-Go. In the midst of luxurious but strict life, GoGo receives a pair of Red Shoes against her grandmothers rules.

programme.title: A Sweet Rush
programme.desc: What began as a tug of war for a six layered cake culminated in Don fixing a security alarm to the kitchen door that stopped anyone from stepping in, even Don himself. Lary Marly and Charly have found a way to dance themselves to the fridge escaping the floor sensors.

programme.title: Two Tickets.
programme.desc: When Gummy wins two tickets to a big dance show, each of his best pals vie to be the one he gives the coveted second ticket to.

programme.title: RAIN IN KELIFORNIA
programme.desc: It is monsoon time and the teashop is leaking at various places. The customers are irritated with rain drops trickling on their head, clothes and even into their tea tumblers. And they start leaving the shop. A tensed Chai Raja orders Sundar to put a sheet over the roof. Sundar obediently and effectively does it and comes back. But Basha seizes the opportunity and wants to have some fun. It is leak marathon in the teashop with a group of suffering customers, angry Chai Raja and a panic stricken Sundar. At last when the entire roof flies off and it is literally monsoon inside the teashop, Basha stylishly comes outside the shop holding a giant umbrella. And all the customers run under it and have their steaming teas and snacks. An angry Chai Raja whacks Sundar and ask him to learn something from the smart Basha!

programme.title: Rainbow Show
programme.desc: Its the day of the Extreme Glow Rainbow. Zip wants to prove shes her own Smighty without her twin brother, Zap, so she grabs hold of the Air Stone which she cannot control. The Air region twists and turns and the Smighties need to be saved from the Villains trap.

programme.title: Dunky's Laundry
programme.desc: GrandPa has entrusted Dunky to get his special Yellow shirt washed and ironed ready. Meanwhile a funny sequence of events and chase is happening between Cat and Keet.

programme.title: Aprils Rain
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to tidy up their island. Negu seizes the chance to send his Dust Mutant to make the island even dirtier. Pai and Xia ask April to make it rain and clean everything effortlessly. But April hasn’t yet mastered this power, and accidentally creates a tornado. Fortunately it defeats the Dust Monster… but unfortunately, it leaves a total mess, and they still have to tidy up.

programme.title: Field Trip Fiasco
programme.desc: The bros set out for a trip to the great Qutab Minar. And they make sure that they got rid of the rat trio before entering. But Larry Charly and Marly are way too smarter than any of us. To make matters worse, they bombard the entire structure and put the blame on Don and Colonel. Will they ever escape this??

programme.title: Broken Umbrella
programme.desc: Giving umbrellas a second life with these fascinating ideas

programme.title: The Garden Guardians
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to take care of their vegetable garden while they go on a trip. Xia and April think it’s the dullest job ever, but Pai is over the moon. Negu seizes the chance to send his Mutant Beetles, who try to wreck the garden, making Pai’s life impossible. He has to use a secret known only to the most green-fingered gardeners to beat the Mutants and save the garden.

programme.title: Pizza Mania
programme.desc: Dunky has made pizza and gives one slice to each of them. Cat likes the pizza so much that he do not want to share the balance pizza with Keet.

programme.title: Where is it?
programme.desc: During a game of hide and seek Deedee and Nino come across a panicky Mewmew who cannot locate his key. Deedee creates a spell to get back all of Mewmew’s missing things and in come his key, including his long lost bubble-cordion and pocket fork. But Mewmew doesn’t want those things back as he had already replaced them. So Deedee offers to keep them as she couldn’t stand the sight of them being thrown away. On the way they find Charlie hiding from his lost but newly found alarm clock that is chasing him. The clock won’t let Charlie sleep a bit by ringing all the time, so Deedee offers to take it along with the rest. Deedee gets many more additions to her lost and found group as many more citizens of Abra-Dabra are affected with lost things. But as Deedee doesn’t have any space to store them, she puts up a give-away store. Now everyone’s happy.

programme.title: Where’s Kala?
programme.desc: When Kala wants to practise her stealth moves, Gummy and Harry volunteer to help her. Soon Kala is scaring them from various hiding places. After a while the duo doesn’t find Kala anymore, they go too paranoid thinking that Kala is plotting an elaborate scaring plan. Gummy and Harry do all sort of crazy things until they find out that Kala actually went away for her audition in the middle of the game.

programme.title: Just A Day’s Work
programme.desc: It is just a usual day in Don’s life and everything goes on as usual. The rat trio is at their nasty best. And Don and Colonel are at their wit’s end. With the entire house going wild, it seems our guys can’t imagine a single day without each other.

programme.title: Paper Cups
programme.desc: What could our DIY make with a paper cup? Lets find out

programme.title: Egg Carton
programme.desc: Hepi and Briko using their smarts make the best use of an old egg carton

programme.title: Who Ate it?
programme.desc: There’s one last donut in the house – and 3 hungry donut lovers... each one of them determined that no one (other than them) gets it!

programme.title: Remote War
programme.desc: Don and the terrific trio are at war for the TV remote. It all comes down to a swallowed remote that changes channels with every hiccup. Now that is very convenient. The mice get ready in Scuba Gear to perform a close tummy surgery to save the remote. Will sentimental soap or Jolly Good cricket win the Toss?

programme.title: The Controllator
programme.desc: Everyone has forgotten April’s birthday, so when a stranger gives her a present, she’s delighted to accept it. It’s one of Negu’s inventions, which makes her do things against her will. When April, controlled by Negu, manages to steal the Glove of the North, Pai and Xia prove that they had remembered her birthday really, and get April to remove the device that’s control her.

programme.title: Tommy’s Got Talent
programme.desc: Charlie and the twins are practising for Mayor De Pfeffle’s talent contest. Deedee isn’t contesting as she didn’t get any time to practice. The twins have a tough time dancing in step with Uncle Charlie’s drum beat. Deedee tries to help them with a remembering spell, but Nino points out that it wouldn’t be fair to use magic in a contest. So Deedee and Nino walk along wishing the twins are able to perfect their act in time. Mewmew si struggling with a juggling act, so Deedee tries to help by conjuring a catching spell, but Nino reminds her it’s wrong just in time. Luciano haughtily sings as he walks. But Deedee and Nino hear an even more beautiful tune emanating from Tommy Prickles house. But Tommy is not too confident to sing in the presence of others. So Deedee comes up with a non-magic way to help. Happy at what Deedee suggests, Tommy decides to enroll. The fabulous prize is Tiggy’s very own specially made jelly. The winner is decided by who gets the highest ovation as measured on the clap-o-meter. Charlie and the twins perform outstandingly, so does Mewmew the juggling rabbit, Luciano’s opera all of whom get loud ovations. Finally it is Tommy prickles turn, but he isn’t able to keep his eyes closed like Deedee suggested him to, making his singing come to an abrupt stop. Deedee asks the audience if they could close their eyes to help Tommy sing. That was all Tommy needed to sing so very melodiously. The clap-o-meter does a full spin and points to the highest score ever. Tommy is declared the winner of Mayor De Pfeffle’s talent contest, that too without magic a wee bit.

programme.title: THE PAI WHO CRIED WOLF
programme.desc: To discover his powers as the Rodent Warrior, Pai goes on a solo night quest. But he keeps seeing the Wolf Warrior (Koto and Amkko in a disguise made by Mei). He runs to tell April and Xia, who don’t believe him. He battles the Wolf Warrior, discovering his Rodent Warrior powers (Super-Burrowing and Super-Cheeks) as he reveals Koto and Amkko inside the disguise.

programme.title: Golden Eggs
programme.desc: Hoodie has his eyes on the hens eggs in GrandPAs farm. Keet has saved them once but is sure Hoodie will try again.

programme.title: Super Hero Don
programme.desc: Don get super powers when he gets thrown to another planet. And when he returns, it is a tough time for Larry Marly and Charly. Now it is the reign of Don - the super hero. But, it all changes when the rats get super powers!! gosh! What will happen to Don now???

programme.title: Library Trouble
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are in the library. And the library has rules – of silence and composure. But with the rats trying their level best to irritate don, the library is as noisy and dirty as a market place in no time!!

programme.title: You Can Leave Your Hat Off
programme.desc: When Odessa doesnt want to get rid of her old coat, now to small, because shes had it forever (and is a little afraid of change), but when she ends up helping Ene find a hat, she learns that change isnt something to be afraid, but something to be embraced. Change can be good

programme.title: A Cold Crunch
programme.desc: It is freezing cold. Don is wrapped in a blanket when he notices a glow from the mouse’s hole. Wearing sunglasses and shorts, They have an orange coil burning right in the centre and its toasty and warm in there. Don has found a solution, he picks up the phone and orders for an electric blanket!

programme.title: Dunky Doll
programme.desc: Hoodie the crow is really upset with Dunky as he is so loyal that GrandPAs house & is the only house were he cannot steal anything.

programme.title: Alone Again Unnaturally
programme.desc: When Pancake goes away to summer camp, Maple has no one to play with. In the Zooniverse, the Zoonicorns are gone as well, and she must team up with Harold to find them! Always be willing to make new friends.

programme.title: The Secrets of the Engine
programme.desc: The kids use the Mach 6 time machine to travel back in time to change their bleak future. They see the origins of the time travel car, their parents, and the rise of the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: The Bigger They Are
programme.desc: Odessa feels overwhelmed by her art project, then in the Zooniverse she helps clear the Rainbow Road of a giant bubble – and learns that big problems can become small, manageable ones. You dont have to do everything all on your own and, asking for help can be one of the best tools for problems solving.

programme.title: The New Otter In Town
programme.desc: After thinking that his mother doesnt know what its like to be a kid, in the Zooniverse, Pancake becomes friends with a fun otter kid - who turns out to be his mom!. Judging people/People are often more than what they seem

programme.title: Once Upon a Time Part 1
programme.desc: Jamillah arrives in Baghdad for the first time accidently squashing Aladdins eggs causing him to bump into Mustafa, the market trader, and ruin all of his stock. Mustafa wants Aladdin to pay or go to jail but Aladdin has no money and therefore no choice but to go to jail! Can Jamillah and Aladdin think of a way to get him out?

programme.title: DANCE DOJO
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to master dancing, much to Xia’s annoyance. April teaches Xia a move that he uses to defeat a Worm Monster and to earn his mondojitsu Brown Socks.

programme.title: Doobydoo Meep Concert
programme.desc: The annual Doobydoo Meep concert is about to take place, and Charlie wants to practice one last time before heading out. So Deedee chips in by agreeing to follow specific instructions to organise the difficult to manage Doobydoos but also promises not to use magic for anything at all. Deedee mixes up the sandwiches for the Doodyboos with the recorders that she ends up sending off with Mewmew. Nino constantly keeps Deedee in check so that she doesn’t back out of her promise. Mewmew is having a tough time organising with the Doobydoos while Deedee finds out Charlie has slept of practising. The concert goes well, but they all decide they won’t have lullabies ever again.

programme.title: Dancing Boots
programme.desc: There are a pair of boots in the window of the Fortune Tellers shop and theyre not for sale as theyre enchanted. Hoping that the boots will give him wonderful powers, Aladdin slips them on and finds himself dancing. Its funny and he loves it, until he tries to stop and cant and so out he dances into the street. Jamillah runs for Genie and together they find some tricky, funny way to waylay Aladdin and remove the boots.

programme.title: Shy Tommy Prickles
programme.desc: Mewmew is all set for her party but didn’t have sufficient time to handout the invitations. Deedee and Nino agree to help. They soon invite all of Abra-Dabra, but Tommy Prickles isn’t so keen on attending, because he feels so very shy. But as Deedee doesn’t have any spell to make Tommy’s shyness go away she improvises without magic by making Tommy believe that she has cast a spell on Tommy’s hat. Tommy agrees to attend the party in the guise that the hat he is wearing is now a chatter hat that will help him talk to others at the party. Nino is confused as he’s happy on one side that magic wasn’t used but sad that Tommy thinks magic is used. Tommy Prickles fits right in at the party and has fun playing with the Doobydoos and talks so freely and happily with everyone. Just then a huge gust of wind ruffles everything including Tommy’s hat. Poor sad Tommy feels so shy and helpless that he wants to go back home. But Deedee implores him to stay by trying to make him hopeful that Nino would return soon with Tommy’s hat. Tommy slumps on the ground and won’t budge, not until Deedee gets Tommy to don Tiggy’s baker hat. Tommy jumps springs back up and rounds all the party goers to teach them his very own special Wiggly Worm dance. Just then as they all dance in a bee-line behind Tommy, Nino flies in with Tommy’s hat. A confused Tommy discovers that he was wearing Tiggy’s hat till then and is flabbergasted to know that Deedee didn’t work any magic into the hat all along. Tommy Prickles runs away crying. Tommy reasons with Deedee that all of Abra-Dabra will think of him as silly, but Deedee tells him that if he couldn’t believe her, then to at least believe those who love having him along. Tommy looks up to see all his friends walking up to him doing the Wiggly Worm dance. Tommy takes a brave step and listens to his friends wanting have him back. He joins them just the way he is, without his ‘magic’ hat. Deedee finally agrees with Nino that sometimes no magic is good.

programme.title: Dimsum To Go
programme.desc: A bowl of lip smacking Dimsums and four pair of eyes. Don tries his best to hide it but in vain! Watch Don and the mice chase each other in this quest.

programme.title: A strange Footprint
programme.desc: Bubbles reads a story about scary monsters to Doubt and Caber. Duda finds her funny, but Caber is really scared. The next morning, Bubbles finds a giant footprint in the ground. Doubt and Caber thinks a monster did it, but Bubbles and Dad tell them that monsters dont exist. Hearing all the commotion about monsters, Scot decides to dress up as one and scare everyone for fun. When he tries to scare Duda, things dont go as planned. Instead of being afraid, Duda is excited to meet the "monster." Duda chases the "monster" up a tree, but soon discovers that he is just a Scotsman in disguise. Suddenly, something falls from the tree! Scot runs away, screaming that he is a real monster. Maybe monsters really exist...

programme.title: The 22.30 Express – Little Red Riding Hood Case 2
programme.desc: SANDRA and FO travel into the story of LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD, having been called out by her and her GRANDMOTHER. When the detective and her assistant arrive, they discover that it has been a year since the FEROCIOUS WOLF unsuccessfully tried to eat LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD and her GRANDMOTHER. Since then, the FEROCIOUS WOLF has been in jail, while LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD and her GRANDMOTHER became the most popular and best-loved people in the community. Everything changed a week ago, when a series of mysterious crimes began in the village and the surrounding area. Everything would seem to indicate that these were committed by LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD and her GRANDMOTHER, who all the villagers now hate. SANDRA and FO must find the real culprit, to demonstrate the innocence of LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD and her sweet GRANDMOTHER

programme.title: It's Santa Claus!
programme.desc: Its a hot summer day, but Duda is reading a book about Santa Claus. Discovering that Santa Claus only gives gifts to children who do good deeds, Duda jumps at every opportunity he gets to help his friends. Later that day, Duda meets up with Pelly. Pelly is upset because she lost all her packages because of a hole in her coat. After seeing Pellys packages and his red jacket, Duda assumes he is Santa Claus. So he volunteers to help Pelly find the rest of his "gifts." He tells all his friends that Santa Claus has shown up, and they all join in looking for packages. They manage to find all the missing packages and bring them to Pelly. Duda excitedly asks Santa "Pelly" for a gift... however, Pelly has some disappointing news.

programme.title: Honey bees Attack
programme.desc: Cat is relaxing in a hammock under the coconut trees at the back of the house reading a newspaper item of an exotic insect whose sting can kill.

programme.title: The Egg
programme.desc: Gummy wakes up with a mysterious egg in his bedroom – and, over Harry’s objections, becomes convinced that it’s ‘Junior’, a future soccer star!

programme.title: Office Fiasco
programme.desc: Don gets a new office job and he is so excited to begin. Are the rats equally excited?? well they are – but for something else. With their pranks and tricks, Larry Marly and Charly make sure that Don doesnt reach his office. But, when he somehow reaches the office, they make sure that the boss throws him out finally.

programme.title: Smile Like An Angel
programme.desc: Duda y sus amigos deciden hacer pareja para ir a una expedición. Scot sugiere hacer una votación y el amigo que no sea elegido tiene que ser socio de un espantapájaros. Desafortunadamente para Scot, termina con el espantapájaros. De vuelta a casa, Scot se pregunta por qué es tan impopular. Con un poco de ayuda de Piggy and Puggy y su invento el Smile Ha-ha, Scot se transforma en un "ángel sonriente" y hace que los hermanos búho anuncien a todo el mundo su nueva y mejorada personalidad. Duda corre a Scot para verlo por sí mismo, y termina causando estragos en el escondite de Scot. Scot casi explota de rabia y le ordena a Duda que se vaya. Sorprendentemente, Duda le dice a todo el mundo lo agradable y divertido que era Scot y todos aparecen en la puerta de Scot. ¿Conseguirá Scot finalmente un compañero para la próxima expedición?

programme.title: San Juan Night
programme.desc: To get some alone time with the beautiful Nora, Fred must jump through multiple hoops, including saving the town’s history book from a fire.

programme.title: 52 The Zoonigames
programme.desc: Pancake is disheartened when Odessa beats him at a game, but after playing a series of games in the Zooniverse, he learns there’s something even more important than winning-or-losing. Playing games is not about winning or losing but bout having fun!

programme.title: Mess at Museum
programme.desc: Dunky takes Keet and Cat to the towns museum which is inside a home to a lot of precious artifacts.

programme.title: Mini Fix
programme.desc: Colonel is building a HUGE MINIATURE city out of LEGO-like blocks. There are trees and roads and houses with windows and tall buildings and a hospital and a police station and prison and pools. Now what could go wrong here???

programme.title: Burping Boulders
programme.desc: Afraid of the loud thunder in the waking world, Maple discovers in the Zooniverse that Ene fears something too - the mysterious and loud burping boulders. Together they go on a journey to face their fears - and find fun along the way. With persistence you can overcome your fears… and sharing your feelings is the start of a solution

programme.title: PAI THE WIZARD
programme.desc: Discouraged with cleaning Maestro Meow’s humble hut, Pai uses the Elder’s conch horn (which Pai thinks is magic) to summon what he thinks are “Cleaner Birds.” But they prove to be Party Birds, and soon have overrun the Westerly Breeze!

programme.title: Captain Blackbeard – Little Mermaid Case 2
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of “The Little Mermaid” by Hans Christian Andersen, having been called out by a Turtle-Doctor, who is attending to NEPTUNE, the king of the seas. The LITTLE MERMAID, the monarch’s youngest daughter, has mysteriously disappeared. NEPTUNE is very sad and his health is in danger. SANDRA and FO will carry out an in-depth investigation, discovering that everything forms part of a plan by the SEA WITCH. The evil villain of the ocean depths has summoned up the perfidious monsters of the sea, in order to gain power over all the oceans.

programme.title: The Forest Without Magic – Rapunzel
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the tale of RAPUNZEL, having been called out by RAPUNZEL herself. She can’t stand being locked up in the tower for a moment longer; she wants to discover the world and escape from the clutches of the odious WITCH once and for all. The Detective and her assistant help RAPUNZEL to escape from the tower, but the WITCH soon finds out that she has gone and sets off in hot pursuit. The WITCH is much more powerful than SANDRA had originally imagined and there is only one way for SANDRA, FO and RAPUNZEL to get out of this adventure alive: to reach the Forest Without Magic.

programme.title: La tonta de Esperanza
programme.desc: Esperanza, una dulce joven, se enamora de Ciril, un desconocido que se aprovecha de ella para sacarle dinero.

programme.title: La tonta de Esperanza
programme.desc: Esperanza, una dulce joven, se enamora de Ciril, un desconocido que se aprovecha de ella para sacarle dinero.

programme.title: La Pobre de Sasha
programme.desc: Román es arrestado antes de casarse. Katia y su padre Boris sabotean su relación con Sasha.

programme.title: La Pobre de Sasha
programme.desc: Sasha huye de la ciudad y termina en medio de un accidente y una red criminal.

programme.title: La Pobre de Sasha
programme.desc: Acusada robo, Sasha huye y cambia de nombre para proteger su vida y la del hijo que espera.

programme.title: China in Focus by NTD
programme.desc: Fast, compelling, first-hand news from China; hosted by Tiffany Meier.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: China in Focus by NTD
programme.desc: Fast, compelling, first-hand news from China; hosted by Tiffany Meier.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Market Open
programme.desc: Market Open

programme.title: Market Pulse
programme.desc: Market Pulse

programme.title: Al Aswaq Al Arabiya 1
programme.desc: Al Aswaq Al Arabiya 1

programme.title: Al Aswaq Al Arabiya 2
programme.desc: Al Aswaq Al Arabiya 2

programme.title: Power Lunch
programme.desc: The business team gathers and rounds up all GCC market activities with analysts from different markets sharing their views live.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Private eye popeye (1080)
programme.desc: Private Eye Popeye gets a call from Olive Oyl to guard a precious gem. But no sooner does he get the gem than the butler takes it (and Olive). The rest of the cartoon is spent chasing the crook to Paris, the Swiss Alps, and North Africa; Popeye always gets there first, but fails to make the arrest until he lucks into some spinach, of course

programme.title: Scotty Finds a Home 1935
programme.desc: A young anthropomorphic kitten wants a pet. He happens to find a puppy with no owner and takes him in. When the Scotty tracks mud into the house, Grandma says that her grandson cannot keep him. A transient bulldog is walking by as Grandma puts a pie in the windowsill to cool. He barges into the house and terrorizes the family, demanding they feed him. Scotty rushes back to the house and saves the family, causing Grandma to decide that they can keep him after all.

programme.title: Betty Boop- More Pep- 1936
programme.desc: In a return to the 'Out of the Inkwell' format, Betty Boop invents a 'pep' formula to speed up lazy Pudgy, but it escapes into the 'real world' with rapid results.

programme.title: Me Feelins is Hurt 1940
programme.desc: Olive writes a letter to Popeye: she's through with sailors; it's cowboys for her. Popeye immediately sails off to the West, where he finds, who else, Bluto as the head of the ranch where Olive is enthralled. Bluto gives Popeye a wild horse to ride, and, after a few humiliating defeats, Popeye conquers it (and wins back Olive's heart). Bluto punches Popeye out, and into the clutches of what can best be described as a rattlesnake constrictor. Bluto then starts menacing Olive, so Popeye eats his spinach, saves her, and defeats Bluto and his gang.

programme.title: Spree Lunch 1957
programme.desc: Popeye opens a diner; Bluto pulls one up right across the street. Wimpy comes along, and they compete for his business. The competition escalates, until finally they are throwing things at each other; Wimpy stands between them and snags a complete meal from the stream of objects passing overhead. Another spinach-free Popeye.

programme.title: Betty Boop Is My Palm Read -1932
programme.desc: For customer Betty Boop, psychic reader Prof. Bimbo conjures up an adventure on a haunted tropical island in his crystal ball

programme.title: Felix in Fairyland-1923
programme.desc: Felix is reading a book about Fairyland, and decides that it must be a wonderful place to be. Suddenly he hears a cry for help, and finds a fly stuck on a piece of flypaper. He rescues the insect, only to have it turn into a beautiful fairy princess who, in gratitude for his help, grants him one wish. He wishes he were in Fairyland, and is immediately transported there.

programme.title: Gopher Spinach 1954
programme.desc: Popeye battles a gopher over his precious spinach plants.

programme.title: The Hole Idea 1955
programme.desc: A scientist invents the portable hole, only to have a thief steal his samples to go on a crime spree.

programme.title: Felix Goes A-Hunting-1923
programme.desc: A wife throws her husband out of the house, telling him not to return unless he brings her a fur coat. Deciding that the only way he'll get one is to make his own, he grabs his rifle and goes hunting. All his efforts fail, though, until he meets Felix, who offers to help him shoot rabbits, and impresses the man with his marksmanship skills. However, it turns out that shooting the rabbits isn't quite as easy as they thought it would be.

programme.title: A Spanish Twist 1932
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry (the human versions, not the cat and mouse) are on a raft in the ocean. After being attacked by an octopus and losing their raft, they wash up on the shores of Spain. After harassing the waitresses at a local sidewalk café, they insult the owner and wind up in a bull ring as punishment. In the midst of fighting dozens of bulls, they receive a telegram that Prohibition has been repealed back in the U.S. They immediately leave Spain headed back to the U.S. for a drink

programme.title: Felix the Ghost Breaker-1923
programme.desc: Felix is trying to get some sleep in a graveyard, but keeps getting bothered by a ghost. He follows the ghost to the house of an old farmer, and the ghost proceeds to terrorize the old man, and when the farmer calls for help from the police, the ghost terrorizes them, too. Felix, however, suspects something fishy is going on, and with the help of the farmer's donkey, gets to the bottom of things.

programme.title: The Good Egg 1939
programme.desc: A hen adopts an abandoned egg which hatches into a turtle. The baby turtle becomes the butt of all the real chicks' jokes until danger threatens

programme.title: Gumbasia 1955
programme.desc: Clay objects of all sizes, shapes and colors contort and reshape themselves to a jazz music score.

programme.title: A Cartoonist's Nightmare 1935
programme.desc: A cartoonist falls victim to the very villains he has drawn. It's up to Beans the Cat to save the day.

programme.title: Molly Moo-Cow and the Indians-1935
programme.desc: A Native American hunter tries to hunt two ducks. A cow saves them, so the hunter goes after the cow

programme.title: Popeye the Sailor Meets Ali Baba's Forty Thieves 1937
programme.desc: Popeye the Sailor, accompanied by Olive Oyl and Wimpy, is dispatched to stop the dreaded bandit Abu Hassan and his force of forty thieves.

programme.title: The Weakly Reporter 1944
programme.desc: A newsreel spoof with WWII homefront gags, including rationing, air raid drills and women filling in men's jobs.

programme.title: Aladdin and His Wonderful Lamp 1939
programme.desc: Working in the story department of Surprise Pictures, Olive Oyl writes a script based on the story of Aladdin, casting Popeye as the thief and herself as the Princess

programme.title: Private Snafu; Volume 1-1943
programme.desc: Introducing Private Snafu, the nation's worst soldier and his various versions in different branches of the armed forces

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show 1963: Season 3; Episode 26;Andy's English Valet
programme.desc: When cultures clash, cars crash, and Andy's home becomes his castle as he engages the employment of a bicycle-touring Englishman who must work off an unfortunately-earned debt.

programme.title: Alice's Wonderland-1923
programme.desc: Alice visits an animation studio, where the animators show her various scenes on their drawing boards. A few of them: a cat dancing to a cat band; a mouse poking at a (live) cat until it moves; a couple mice boxing, while the animators crowd around cheering and acting as corner-men. That night, she dreams of taking a train to cartoon-land, where a red carpet reception awaits. She appears in live action. They have a welcoming parade, with Alice riding on an elephant. The cartoons dance for her, and she dances for them. Meanwhile, the lions break out of the zoo. The lions chase her into a hollow tree, then into a cave and down a rabbit hole. Finally, she jumps off a cliff and awakes back in her bed

programme.title: Mabel, Fatty and the Law
programme.desc: In a small city park where strict vigilance is maintained against flirting. Mabel, a young and pretty wife with a bore of a husband innocently amuses herself with the harmless attentions of Fatty. Fatty relishes the situation all the more because this is one of those rare occasions, when he has succeeded in escaping from the jailer-like watchfulness of his wife. Meanwhile, Fatty's wife and Mabel's husband are carrying on a similar game. They are discovered by the police and a sensational arrest ensues. Both couples appear in court, where numerous complications make a reel full of fun.

programme.title: Young Sherlocks-1922
programme.desc: The Mystic J.J.J.'s challenge Ernie's bravery; he spins a tale of saving a rich young girl from kidnappers and of creating a utopia called Freetown.

programme.title: War Babies 1932
programme.desc: A group of soldiers in a café watch a dancer as she entertains them, but later two of them become rivals over her.

programme.title: Caught in a Cabaret 1914
programme.desc: Charlie is a clumsy waiter in a cheap cabaret and must endure the strict orders from his boss. He meets a pretty girl in the park and pretends to be a fancy ambassador but must contend with the jealousy of her fiancé.

programme.title: The Dick Van Dyke Show 1962; Season 2; Episode 1; Never Name a Duck
programme.desc: Ritchie becomes very attached to two baby ducks that were left over from a show and adopts them. Rob faces the task of making Ritchie understand the consequence of trying to keep pets that may be happier living in the wild.

programme.title: The Pawnshop- 1916
programme.desc: Charlie competes with his fellow shop assistant. He is fired by the pawnbroker and rehired. He nearly destroys everything in the shop and himself. He helps capture a burglar. He destroys a client's clock while examining it in detail

programme.title: Made for Each Other 1939
programme.desc: While on a business trip, an ambitious young lawyer meets and immediately falls in love with a stranger. They wed the following day, and tragedy soon strikes.

programme.title: See what happened in the world of sports while you were sleeping!
The latest sports that you may have missed!
You are watching the latest sports news from around the world!
Game previews, highlights and interviews from your favorite sport!
Sergeant Preston of the Yukon:S2E19: Blind Justice
programme.desc: Blind sled dog helps Sergeant Preston and King save grandfather's and grandson's business from swindlers, grandson adopts the blind dog and King helps train him

programme.title: Roll Along, Cowboy-1937
programme.desc: Singing cowboy Randy shows up at Mrs. Blake's ranch. She is beset by bad guys, and Randy loves her daughter Janet.

programme.title: Esther and the King 1960
programme.desc: In Esther and the King, the timeless biblical story unfolds in a lavish tale of courage, love, and destiny. When King Ahasuerus of Persia (Richard Egan) seeks a new queen, the beautiful and humble Esther (Joan Collins) is chosen, unaware that her faith will soon be tested. As a deadly plot threatens her people, Esther must summon her strength to risk everything and protect them. With grandeur, passion, and epic spectacle, this historical drama brings to life one of the Bible’s most inspiring heroines.

programme.title: The Jack Benny Christmas Show 1961
programme.desc: In The Jack Benny Christmas Show, holiday cheer meets classic comedy as Jack Benny brings his trademark wit to a festive television special. Joined by his regular cast and surprise guests, Benny’s dry humor and perfectly timed gags light up the season with laughter. Blending sketches, music, and holiday spirit, this variety show captures the warmth and fun of Christmas in true Jack Benny style.

programme.title: Herod the Great 1959
programme.desc: In Herod the Great, the turbulent life of one of history’s most infamous rulers unfolds in epic fashion. After securing his throne through ambition and bloodshed, King Herod struggles to hold power over Judea amid political intrigue, betrayal, and the looming rise of a new faith. Caught between ruthless authority and his own inner torment, Herod’s reign is marked by both grandeur and tragedy. With sweeping battles, palace drama, and a powerful portrayal of a king consumed by fear, this historical epic brings to life the dark legacy of a ruler whose name echoes through the ages.

programme.title: A Trip to the Moon by George Mlis 1902 B&W Silent
The Man Who Knew Too Much
Ben and Charlie 1972
programme.desc: In Ben and Charlie, Giuliano Gemma and George Eastman team up in a Spaghetti Western full of action, humor, and mischief. Ben, a smooth-talking drifter, and Charlie, a hot-tempered brawler, form an unlikely partnership as they stumble from one scheme to another across the frontier. Chased by outlaws, double-crossed by swindlers, and forever at odds with each other, the two rogues turn trouble into adventure at every turn. With sharp banter, lively gunfights, and offbeat charm, this buddy Western proves that friendship can be as wild as the West itself.

programme.title: Apocalypse Joe 1970
programme.desc: In Apocalypse Joe, Anthony Steffen stars as a wandering gunslinger who inherits land in a lawless frontier town. When ruthless killers move in to claim it for themselves, Joe answers with blazing six-guns, deadly precision, and a flair for theatrical showdowns. Bursting with Spaghetti Western style—complete with brutal action, sweeping vistas, and a haunting score—this cult favorite turns vengeance into a deadly performance on the stage of the Wild West.

programme.title: El Extranjero
programme.desc: La historia de un humilde hombre de negocios, Quan (Jackie Chan), cuyo pasado erupciona en una venganza desenfrenada después de que su hija muera en un atentado terrorista motivado por aspectos políticos. En su búsqueda de los terroristas, Quan se ve atrapado en un juego del gato y el ratón con un político irlandés que colabora con el gobierno británico (Pierce Brosnan), cuyo pasado podría tener algo que ver con los asesinos.

programme.desc: Vicki goes to a department store to buy a gift for Gus and is unexpectedly asked to fill in as a sales clerk for a day. Gus is none too happy when he finds her on the job.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Sean lights up a conversation with Law Ream, the insightful palate behind the Republic of Debauchery cigar review channel. Beyond his celebrated reviews, Law shares his journey into the world of cigar criticism, his unique methodology for dissecting a blend, and what he believes truly makes a cigar worthy of his praise.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar expert Chris Kelly to review the Rocky Patel Disciple cigar. Together, they explore its bold flavors, impeccable construction, and smooth burn, offering their insights on what makes this cigar a must-try for aficionados.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar enthusiast Jared to review the Henry Clay Warhawk cigar. Join them as they examine its robust flavors, smooth burn, and overall experience, sharing their thoughts on how this bold cigar compares to others in its class.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar connoisseur John Callery to review the Perdomo cigar. Together, they explore its well-rounded flavors, consistent burn, and overall smoking experience, sharing their expert opinions on what makes this cigar a standout choice for enthusiasts.

programme.title: The Burn Down Podcast
programme.desc: Oris Erhuero, a multitalented actor, producer, model, and cigar aficionado, joins us to share his passion for cigars and his journey through acting and modeling since the '90s. He opens up about his life-changing experience of being shot seven times in New York, and how it reshaped his career. Oris also shares how he earned the title of United Kingdom's Cigar Smoker of the Year in 2022!

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow
programme.desc: In this episode, we chat with Storm Boen from Operation Cigars For Warriors, an organization that holds a special place in my heart for providing deployed troops with much-needed downtime. We dive into their history and discuss their involvement in our TCR Charity Herf.

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow
programme.desc: In this episode, we are visited by Stephen Rast of Tobacco Cabana to sit down and talk about something that is near and dear to us... the care of our beloved humidors during the winter months.

programme.title: The Cigar Guys Podcast
programme.desc: The Cigar Guys uncover some of the strangest cigar names they've come across in this special episode. From the bizarre to the downright hilarious, join the fun and decide which cigar takes the crown for the weirdest name of all time!

programme.title: Dissecting the Kendrick-Drake Battle
programme.desc: The Kendrick-Drake battle was so much that I had to do a whole episode about it. I called some MCs and people who love to deconstruct lyrics and we went deep through all the major songs of the battle. This is the dissection that you need.

programme.title: June 9, 2025
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a video message for June 9, 2025, encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: Do Our Kids Run the Show?
programme.desc: OK, it's clear our kids are just playing us... but should we punish it or ENCOURAGE IT?!? Maybe as parents we should be rewarding their clever creativity and resourcefulness. Have YOU had moments where you kid get the best of you? How did it make you feel? Were you angry or proud?

programme.title: Guests Tasia Simpson, Wendy Lee Turner, and Charlie Mac
programme.desc: Yonathan Elias is joined by Tasia Simpson, Wendy Lee Turner, and Charlie Mac who play Couch Party for the Culture and for cash!

programme.title: Guest Jasmine Paul
programme.desc: Jasmine Paul, founder of The Wealth Playground, talks about maintaining your peace and financial freedom in turbulent times.

programme.title: Forks Over Knives
programme.desc: Can a plant-based diet reverse chronic diseases? Forks Over Knives puts food as medicine to the test

programme.title: At Home with The Jenners - Planting Roots
programme.desc: From garden to gourmet, join Cayley & Brandon Jenner as they unleash flavors of plant-based cooking.

programme.title: Short Films - Redfoo & Jazzy's Day with PLANT CEO
programme.desc: LMFAO's Redfoo & his partner Jazzy are sexy and they know it. And, they love animals & vegan life!

programme.title: New Day New Chef - Downtown Squash
programme.desc: Ron Russell creates an impressive butternut squash coulis with roasted vegetables & vegan feta cream

programme.title: Meet the Chickens -Short Film
programme.desc: This short and uplifting film will change everything you thought you knew about chickens!

programme.title: Python Island
programme.desc: A group of people searching for a magical tree in a mysterious jungle, find they are not alone. Something is watching them, waiting for the perfect moment to strike...

programme.title: Ouija Deadly Reunion
programme.desc: Strange happenings occur to some friends before a birthday party in a large warehouse. Two of them find an old spirit board and they decide to contact the dead victim former tenants...

programme.title: Dead End Demon (aka Dead End 2)
programme.desc: It has been almost 2 years since the small town of Santa Carla had suffered in the hands of the raging maniac, Cameron Crowe. Legend around town had it as that he may have been burnt in a fire he started...

programme.title: Aldea del Vampiro
programme.desc: Rebecca busca a su hermana, una joven periodista desaparecida mientras investigaba una serie de desafortunados sucesos. El rastro la conduce a Timere, un lugar remoto alejado del ajetreo de la vida cotidiana, donde entre el hermético silencio de los habitantes del pueblo crece el temor a que actúen fuerzas oscuras y nadie se atreve a salir de casa por la noche. Aquí Rebecca conoce a un extravagante escritor, al guardián de la iglesia del pueblo y, sobre todo, a Caleb, un hombre encantador, rico y elegante cuya oscura mirada esconde un escalofriante secreto. Es en este pueblo, donde el tiempo parece moverse entre las sombras y el peligro acecha en cada esquina, donde Rebecca se entera de la terrible verdad y comienza la batalla entre el bien y el mal...

programme.title: Día del Abandono
programme.desc: Jenny Bilson, una estudiante de último curso de instituto, es la estudiante perfecta, la maravillosa hija de un veterano detective de policía y todo un sueño americano. Pero el único error que no es consciente de haber cometido está a punto de perseguirla de una forma muy violenta, cuando su pasado regresa en busca de venganza...

programme.title: El Equipo Del Diablo
programme.desc: En una ciudad que queda en la frontera de México y los Estados Unidos hay una batalla entre los narcos El 8 y el Z4 que controlan todo el territorio, pero hay un comando especial de mercenarios que trabajan para su propia cuenta se llaman "El Equipo del Diablo" y su líder es el malvado Diablo. Cuando el gobierno quiere parar lo que esta pasando mandan al agente Ortiz para poner orden, pero como siempre cuando se trata de sicarios, ejercito, y narco.. Solamente el pueblo sale dañado.

programme.title: El Mundo Es Tuyo 2
programme.desc: Esta es la continuación del MUNDO ES TUYO. Por fin sabremos que sucedió con los personajes de esta impactante historia.

programme.title: Dinero Maldito
programme.desc: En esta película les presento una historia muy triste donde un hombre pobre echa a perder su vida al encontrarse un dinero y hacerse rico. me acompañan el gran actor Sergio Reynoso y la guapísima Elizabeth Solís. No se la pierdan.

programme.title: El Cóndor En Nueva York
programme.desc: Un narcotraficante de Nueva York, llamado Damián, ha creado una nueva droga con efectos impactantes. Después de varias muertes accidentales, la DEA y la policía se embarcan en una búsqueda inútil en busca de este jefe de la mafia. Damián comienza a derrotar a su competencia con la ayuda de su científico privado y un informante de la DEA. El hijo del alcalde Martínez (de Súper Cóndor) queda en coma tras consumir el nuevo medicamento. El alcalde Martínez vuela a Nueva York desde Perú para comenzar su propia investigación en busca de Damián y una cura. Todo parece sombrío para los agentes de la DEA, el alcalde Martínez y su hijo; hasta que llegue la ayuda. El Cóndor llega a Nueva York desde Perú para ayudar a revertir los efectos de esta nueva y brutal droga y llevar a Damián ante la justicia.

programme.title: Esposa de Vacaciones
programme.desc: Aprovechando la ausencia de su esposa, un hombre se sumerge en las tentaciones que ofrece el ciber espacio y conoce a una mujer casada. Ellos vivirán un romance idílico sin dimensionar las consecuencias.

programme.title: Aute Retrato
programme.desc: Recopilación de los mejores momentos de Luis Eduardo Aute en sus 50 años de carrera musical y artística. Un recorrido por sus distintas facetas creativas y sus bandas sonoras. Toda la vida el artista desvelada por un grupo de testigos, colaboradores y amigos que, a través de sus testimonios, demuestran el impacto que han tenido sus icónicas canciones sobre la actualidad musical.

programme.title: 48 Horas de Terror
programme.desc: Mateo un escritor citadino adquiere una casa de campo en donde planea vivir con su esposa y escribir en la tranquilidad del campo, pero no tomo en cuenta las trágicas noticias de los acontecimientos de canibalismo que ocurrieron a manos de sus vecinos quienes solo buscan sacias su hambre. Mateo y su esposa corren por sus vidas entre las desoladas montañas buscando sobrevivir al ataque de estos caníbales al final sobrevivirá el más fuerte

programme.title: The Juniors y La Formula Imperial
programme.desc: Narra las vidas de 7 adolescentes millonarios que se aventuran a planificar una revolución social, generada por vídeo-escándalos y experimentos médicos, con el objetivo de generar un cambio en la ideología mundial, el conflicto entre las clases sociales y el enfrentamiento con sus muchachas de servicio doméstico.

programme.title: Mi Pequeña Pesadilla
programme.desc: Después de la terrible experiencia y la pérdida de sus amigos, Heather se ve obligada a regresar al Hotel Fear donde Travis se prepara para sus próximas víctimas. Heather debe luchar una vez más.

programme.title: Say Hey By Faith
programme.desc: You’re bigger than what you’re living in. In “Say Hey By Faith,” Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us that just because your current circumstances feel foreign doesn’t mean you’re not currently in the promise.

programme.title: Say Yes to Simple
programme.desc: In “Say Yes To Simple,” Holly Furtick of Elevation Church reveals simple, practical ways to face our toughest situations.

programme.title: The Gift Of Grief
programme.desc: Some of us have believed the lie that “sad is bad,” and we’ve only brought our positivity to God. But when we bring our disappointment to Him, we learn that difficult seasons can become the cornerstone of our faith. Lisa Harper encourages us that our compassionate God is near in “The Gift Of Grief.”

programme.title: God’s Got The Hard Part!
programme.desc: Just like a seed, you’re not buried, you’re planted. When you feel like you’re facing trials in the dark, remember God’s developing you to help you fulfill your purpose.

programme.title: Knocking Through The No
programme.desc: In “Knocking Through The No,” Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us that the doors of tomorrow’s opportunities swing on the hinges of today’s obedience.
